channel.title: Team on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Team on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: #2 Walk Around Learn Around
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: There are so many amazingly fun and wonderfully weird things happening on Discord, both last week and of course, today. So let‚Äôs dive in with a freshly-brewed ‚Äúc√† ph√™ s·ªØa,‚Äù of course.

item.title: #1 What Do You Stand For?
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Lock in Your Workspace. Show the World. Our Discord crew is buzzing with energy after our last Friday community call, with folks sharing snapshots of their workspaces.

item.title: Culture Handbook
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Towards growth Keep learning and growing. We started this team out of software practice advancement. The continuous study lays the foundation for the future growth.

item.title: Life at Dwarves
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: We’re like-minded teammates who pursue ambitious goals with tech culture and codes of conduct. Build a place we love to work at We build this company like we build a product.

item.title: 2022 In Review
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Successfully went through 2022, a year that we might say - a new record: team reached highest growth record, kickstarted community engagement, home, compliance training & individual development are speeding up, and a whole new place to call Dwarves.

item.title: Dwarves Of The Year 2022
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: It’s been a long journey, but we’ve finally made it to 2022 and what a year it’s been for our team of Dwarves.

item.title: The Inner Circle
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: The concept of an “inner circle” within a company is not a new one, and at Dwarves, a software company founded by a group of engineers, this idea holds a significant value.

item.title: Dwarves Summit 2022 Engineering A Good Time
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: We don‚Äôt treat team bonding the common way because we understand our engineers. Most of our engineers don‚Äôt want to run and get sweaty on the beach for ‚Äúteam-building‚Äù activities, or pretend to smile in front of the travel agent‚Äôs camera.

item.title: Configure The Company Email
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Make sure you have 2FA enabled For this method to work, you need to have¬†two factor authentification¬†enabled for your Google account.

item.title: Sharing
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Sharing At Dwarves Foundation, we believe that sharing is an important part of our culture. We share almost everything: every week, a lot of events are open to the public, and some of them are recorded so that anyone can watch the videos to learn.

item.title: Passing The Probation Get 3 Upvotes
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: The talent pool Dwarves are backed by the talent pool. We‚Äôre selective for those that are in the funnel. Like-minded people and their unique values stay above everything.

item.title: Road To 100
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: 2022 matched us with the 80th Dwarves. A notable highlight, and we’re ready to have more. It’s not easy to find people that has the same value.

item.title: The Next Leading Chairs
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Our vision for growth Last Jan 2020, we got the chance to celebrate our first milestone -¬†Dwarves Foundation reached 5 years old.

item.title: The future is blockchain and data
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: It‚Äôs Han and Nikki here, Plus an extra fresh voice we‚Äôre bringing to Dwarves Updates, in hope we can offer you more engineering-related insights and thoughts.

item.title: Dwarves Apprenticeship 2022 Meet The Mentors Ngoc Thanh Pham
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Dwarves Team is shifting our focus to blockchain technology. We offer study groups and blockchain-based projects for peeps to grow and catch up with this rising trend.

item.title: Dwarves Apprenticeship 2022 Meet The Mentors Tuan Dao
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Tuan Dao - Senior Frontend/ Blockchain Engineer Tuan has 4+ years of experience under his belt, 2 out of those 4+ was spent at Dwarves Foundation.

item.title: It's a wrap: 2021 in Review
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Hey, it‚Äôs Han and Nikki in your inbox again. On behalf of the entire Dwarves team, happy 2022! For us 2021 is eventful, and memorable.

item.title: Dwarves Radio Talk 17 Conduct A 1 1 Session
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: In this Radio Talk,¬†Thanh Pham¬†- our Head of Web, shared how he conducts a 1-1 meeting with the Fellows.

item.title: Dwarves Radio Talk 16 Run An Effective Performance Review
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Performance Review We perform bi-yearly reviews in July and January. The primary purpose of these reviews is to **give feedback **on career path advancement and recognize accomplishments.

item.title: What's New in July 2021
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: We’re closing July with some notable highlights. Let’s go through them. üö® Note: Covid situation is getting worse. Stay safe. ü¶†

item.title: Making Decision As A Team Member
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Democracy in a Nutshell Sure we all heard of democracy. Mostly, this term appears in erhm, election? However, from what I understand, democracy is maintained by giving decision-making power to the people.

item.title: The Adjacent Possible
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: During our study about innovation, we find the topic of adjacent possible. Innovation happens but not many people can point out clearly.

item.title: Purpose
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Where we are heading We start with purpose. The mankind is here today because of 4 billion years of continuous evolution from a single cell to homo sapiens, through the stone age to bronze, iron, medieval to post-classical and renaissance.

item.title: Delegation And Believe It Will Work
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: We can’t always make things (or everything) on our own. If that somehow truly happens, then Inc, Corp, Enterprise or Group won’t stand a chance with Freelancers.

item.title: Constructive Feedback
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: It’s in human nature to instantly lose their mind when things get hard, and somehow they split nasty things that can’t be undone.

item.title: 2019 In Review
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Another year has gone by. And we just celebrated the 5th year that we survived all the challenges. Everyone was facing their own, but I have seen many of you reaching new stages and achieve new targets.

item.title: Delegate Work Not Responsibility
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: We can bring in all the technology in the world, but if we can‚Äôt delegate properly, our companies have no chance of scaling well.

item.title: Email Communication and Use
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Email Communication and Use We use email as our formal tool for both internal and external communication. Every email is utilized for a specific field, which comes along with different instructions.

item.title: Benefits & Perks
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Benefits & Perks Since most Dwarves Foundation employees work in Saigon, this section is written with that as the default.

item.title: Effective Meeting
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Effective Meeting To increase flexibility in how and where employees at Dwarves work, we agree on a shared set of constraints for group work and meetings.

item.title: FAQ
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: FAQ How to pronounce the company name? Dwarf is one of the hardest words to pronounce to the non-English speaker, but that‚Äôs what made we special.

item.title: What we stand for
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: What we stand for Empower Innovation with Software Craftsmanship Innovation happens. There are many startups found and raise fund every day.

item.title: What we value
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: What we value Before anything else, values come first. The value is important to us. They are what we proud of.

item.title: Where we work
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Where we work Office The Dwarves HQ is in Saigon, Vietnam. Fifty-ish people and two cats have desk space in the Saigon office, but those people also work from home regularly.

item.title: Who does what
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Who does what Figuring out whom to bring a particular issue or question to shouldn‚Äôt be a guessing game. Most concerns fall pretty clearly within the responsibility of a specific team at Dwarves Foundation, and the head of that team should be the first point of contact.

item.title: 2018 In Review
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: 2018 was the memorable year with lots of achievements. We adapted the new team structure. We defined things we value and live that culture tediously.

item.title: Make Remote Working Works
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Being office-present keeps you effective. Firms lean on that. It explains why companies are down to invest a fortune on building creative office with other benefit packages.

item.title: Benefits And Perks
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Since the majority of Dwarves Foundation employees work in Saigon, this section is written with that as the default. Some benefits don‚Äôt make sense in other countries.

item.title: How We Hire
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Hiring means we need help. We only hire people who tell us what to do, not the other way around. We always look for long-term teammates that why we want to ensure the new hire is a value fit and culture fit.

item.title: How We Work
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: We do Agile We build software. The way we see it is a collaboration between multiple people in the team with sufficient knowledge on the domain and clearly understand the project vision that they can quickly adapt to the changes in the market.

item.title: Making A Career
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: The average tenure of employees working at many technology companies today is shockingly low. At both Amazon, Google and other companies, it‚Äôs just around one year.

item.title: What We Stand For
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Empower Innovation with Software Craftsmanship Innovation happens. There are many startups found and raise fund every day. They focus on making significant positive changes, impact millions of people, lead to breakthroughs and support the foundation of economic growth.

item.title: What We Value
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Before anything else, values come first. The value is important to us. They are what we proud of. They help guide us when we are facing a difficult decision.

item.title: Where We Work
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Office The Dwarves HQ is in Saigon, Vietnam. Thirty people and two cats have desk space in the Saigon office, but those people also work from home regularly.
